references.paper_title: Qwen2-VL: Enhancing vision-language model's perception of the world at any resolution
references.reason: This citation is relevant because the VARGPT-v1.1 model utilizes Qwen2-VL as its language model backbone, making it a core component of the architecture.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work is relevant due to its contribution to diffusion models, which are mentioned as an alternative approach to visual generation, against which the current autoregressive method is compared.

references.paper_title: Direct preference optimization: Your language model is secretly a reward model
references.reason: This citation is relevant because VARGPT-v1.1 uses DPO as a core part of training through reinforcement learning to improve its performance.
